metadata.title: CVE-2023-52820 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm_lease.c: copy user-array safelyCurrently, there is no overflow-check with memdup_user().Use the new function memdup_array_user() instead of memdup_user() forduplicating the user-space array safely.
